extendedInfo.description: It is a Color LED app that you should touch screen to change color . Color LED has different color to change , except a set of fixed colors . Color LED sets the custom colors that change the screen and LED together . When you in the dark place or in the evening , Color LED can use as flashlight . More color select , more fashion , more special . Color LED has clear interface , simple operation and custom colors . A new playing method , a simple app makes your phone to be a moved LED . When you want to show your love to your lover , or waitting for your friends at the bus station and airport , or you are so bording , you can play it to make your life more color and funny.

reviews.title: Hmmmm
reviews.comment: I haven\'t quite figured this one out yet but so far I\'m not digging it!
